description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Emblazon Antimagic]{Emblazon Antimagic}.

When the weapon's wielder critically hits with the weapon, they can attempt to counteract a spell on their target, using half their level, rounded up, as the counteract level. If they attempt to do so, the emblazoned symbol immediately disappears.

rules.text: When you critically hit with the this weapon, you can attempt to counteract a spell on your target, using half your level (rounded up) as the counteract level. If you do this, the emblazon symbol immediately disappears.
